content.raw:
Nice! great work. Please remember to remove those ```GZ_BUILD_EXTRA_EXE_SRCS``` lines.

I'm 99% sure but just in case, I've launched an [ABI checker job](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/API_ABI%20checker/job/gazebo-any_to_any-abichecker-quantal-amd64/32/) to be 100% sure we are not touching the ABI here.

Congrats again, jenkins slaves will love you.
